title: James Shaw steps down from Green Party leadership
description: James Shaw will be stepping down as Green Party co-leader in March.

title: Reeves refuses to use £28bn figure while defending Labour green investment plan
description: In 2021, shadow chancellor promised that a Labour government would borrow £28bn a year for five years to fund green energy projects

title: Las Vegas swingers house with massive underground party bunker is impossible to sell - dropping from $18 million to just $6 MILLION
description: The famous 'Las Vegas Underground House' on 3970 Spencer Street became available to purchase for a second time in February 2023 for $6 million.

title: Blaenau Gwent Council Ebbw Vale South by-election candidates

title: Erdogan’s party sets up political offshoot in Germany
description: “An Erdogan offshoot running for election here is the last thing we need,” said Cem Özdemir, the German agriculture minister and a member of the Green Party who is one of the most high-profile members of Germany’s three million-strong Turkish communit

title: Rishi Sunak’s net zero targets are a ‘path to ruin’, says leading Tory MP
description: Craig Mackinlay accuses PM of ‘shameful acceptance of decline’ in the name of the green agenda and urges an end to damaging climate policies

title: Mayor and Government urged to boost funding for London's green energy projects
description: A London Assembly investigation has found that local planning rules are also causing serious delays to some community energy schemes

title: Iceland boss backs Labour as Starmer promises to protect ‘pound in your pocket’
description: Former Conservative donor and Iceland boss Richard Walker has thrown his support behind the Labour Party, calling it the “right choice” for businesses.
